mapper.select:
select
from [qdtlzf].[dbo].[tlsh] where tzr =#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and gszcmc like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tiaojian.business_registration_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') and fdmc like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tiaojian.store_business_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and shbm like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tiaojian.merchant_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and whr like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tiaojian.guardian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and shlyqd like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tiaojian.source_channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and shzt like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tiaojian.business_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and zd_zdzt like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tiaojian.terminal_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and shsptgrq BETWEEN #{tiaojian.startTime} AND #{tiaojian.endTime} order by shsptgrq desc
